page.title: 06HOME LIFE _ INTERVIEWS
page.content: {Retired couple}Mr.& Mrs.Green, have lived at Chapel Yard in their pretty semi-detached cottage for 17yrs. They enjoy the open country, gardening & fresh foods. There is a well & a pump. Shopping is done in Bedford-\ hr drive away. There is no shop or Public House but various clubs exist locally. They regularly attend the local Church. A doctor is available locally. Mrs.Green enjoys novels & biographies & Mr.Green watches sport,especially cricket. They both enjoy satirical comedies. {A Young Mother}loved the view,clear air & open fields of corn.Orders of milk, papers & mail were left at the end of the road. Everyone had phone,T.V.,& radio. She liked nature & documentary programmes. Her husband liked watching football. Most people living there worked elsewhere. (cont. page 7)
